MonsterTrait.Name: Death Burst
MonsterTrait.Text: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 feet of the mephit must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 (1d8) fire damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The mephit can innately cast blur, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Steam Breath (Recharge 6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
